title: Start the LockService from the Activity as well, in case the device has not been…
message: Start the LockService from the Activity as well, in case the device has not been rebooted or no new data items have arrived yet

title: Only query data items that match the specified path
message: Only query data items that match the specified path

title: Start the service whenever onCreate is called, the first data item will just…
message: Start the service whenever onCreate is called, the first data item will just temporarily start the service, this will ensure it is on permanently, and survives a reboot

title: LockService now runs forever, and use a BroadcastReceiver to start it up when…
message: LockService now runs forever, and use a BroadcastReceiver to start it up when the device boots, so this should always be able to hold a lock now

title: Renamed to LockService because it will run forever and not just when data items arrive
message: Renamed to LockService because it will run forever and not just when data items arrive

title: Do not use DataItemListenerService on the phone side, it is never used
message: Do not use DataItemListenerService on the phone side, it is never used

title: Use play-services-wearable and remove AppCompat in order to save APK size
message:
Use play-services-wearable and remove AppCompat in order to save APK size

Removing play-services went from 4.7mb to 3.3mb
Removing AppCompat went from 3.3mb to 2.7mb

title: Move the Toast.makeText onto a UI thread since it cannot run from a background…
message: Move the Toast.makeText onto a UI thread since it cannot run from a background thread or you get a RuntimeException
